name: Alex Rivera
headline: CTO at FinTech Forward | Building the future of payments
about: Passionate technology leader with 15+ years of experience in fintech and banking. Currently leading the engineering team at FinTech Forward, where we are revolutionizing cross-border payments. Expert in cloud architecture, security, and building high-performing teams.
recentActivity: Shared an article about the future of blockchain in banking.
Congratulated the team on the Series B funding round.
